sections.title: Installation
sections.content: This laptop comes with Secure Boot enabled, so this must be disabled for the Arch Linux ISO to boot.

sections.title: Hibernation
sections.content: After resuming from hibernation, excluding the power and camera toggle button, the keyboard and mouse might not work. However, all connected USB devices and the touch screen still work.

sections.title: Secure Boot
sections.content: This device allows the use of custom keys, but it is untested whether Microsoft Windows keys are required to make the dedicated graphics work. The card works with the Windows keys.

sections.title: See Also
sections.content: - Using the IR Camera to imitate Windows Hello: Howdy
